name: Letter of Authority Process
description: Process for obtaining information about an existing client policy through a Letter of Authority (LOA).

stages.name: Initiate LOA Process
stages.description: Start the Letter of Authority process for an existing policy

tasks.title: Receive Policy Details
tasks.description: Client provides existing policy information and account numbers

tasks.title: Verify Policy Information
tasks.description: Confirm policy details and provider information

tasks.title: Research Provider Contact Details
tasks.description: Find correct contact information for the policy provider

stages.name: Prepare LOA
stages.description: Create and prepare the Letter of Authority for client signature

tasks.title: Create LOA Document
tasks.description: Generate Letter of Authority with appropriate scope and permissions

tasks.title: Add Required Information
tasks.description: Include policy details, client information, and requested data

tasks.title: Review LOA Content
tasks.description: Ensure LOA contains all necessary information and permissions

tasks.title: Send LOA to Client
tasks.description: Send LOA document to client for signature

stages.name: Client Signature
stages.description: Obtain client signature on the Letter of Authority

tasks.title: Client Reviews LOA
tasks.description: Client reviews Letter of Authority content and scope

tasks.title: Client Signs LOA
tasks.description: Client signs and returns the Letter of Authority

tasks.title: Store Signed LOA
tasks.description: Save signed LOA document to client file

tasks.title: Chase for Signature
tasks.description: Follow up with client if LOA not returned in reasonable time

stages.name: Submit to Provider
stages.description: Submit the signed LOA to the policy provider

tasks.title: Send LOA to Provider
tasks.description: Submit signed LOA to appropriate provider contact

tasks.title: Confirm Receipt
tasks.description: Contact provider to ensure LOA has been received

tasks.title: Request Timescale
tasks.description: Ask provider for expected response time

tasks.title: Resend if Required
tasks.description: Resend LOA if provider advises it wasn't received

stages.name: Follow-up & Information Gathering
stages.description: Follow up with provider and gather requested policy information

tasks.title: Monitor Response Time
tasks.description: Track expected response time and follow up if overdue

tasks.title: Chase Provider
tasks.description: Contact provider for updates on LOA processing

tasks.title: Receive Policy Information
tasks.description: Collect policy details and documentation from provider

tasks.title: Store Policy Documents
tasks.description: Save all received policy information to client file

tasks.title: Check for Omissions
tasks.description: Review received information for any missing details

tasks.title: Request Missing Information
tasks.description: Contact provider for any missing policy details

stages.name: Complete Process
stages.description: Finalize the LOA process and update client records

tasks.title: Update Client Records
tasks.description: Update client records with complete policy details

tasks.title: Record Service Status
tasks.description: Document service status and ongoing fees for the policy

tasks.title: Notify Client
tasks.description: Inform client that policy information has been received

tasks.title: Pass to Relevant Party
tasks.description: Forward complete information to paraplanner or adviser as needed

tasks.title: Close LOA Process
tasks.description: Mark LOA process as complete and file all documentation
